hasCommercialCooking.displayName: Does any location include commercial cooking or a restaurant exposure?

compliesNFPA.displayName: Do all locations comply with all required NFPA life Safety Code guideline?

options: More than 20% EIFS (Exterior Insulation Finishing System) exposure
Tenant working with or storing toxic, hazardous, highly-flammable or explosive chemicals or substances

priorCodeViolation.displayName: Have any properties been in breach of State or Federal building codes within the last 5 years?

ineligibleOccupants.displayName: Select all of the following industries, operations or products any tenant has operations involving or related to:

locationHazardsOperations.displayName: Select all of the following that apply to any location:
options: Rentals on short-term or seasonal basis (less than 6 months)
Tenant evicted in the past six (6) months or in the process of being evicted
Tenant subleases a location to another tenant

buildingHazards.displayName: Select all of the following that apply to any building:
options: Any ongoing or planned structural renovations during the policy term
Renovations exceeding 20% of the building value during the policy term

hasElevatorMaintenanceAgreement.displayName: Is there an elevator maintenance agreement in effect, naming the applicant as an additional insured with hold harmless?

hasOccupancyPartialTenantOwnership.displayName: Does the applicant occupy and operate out of the building or do they have partial ownership of a tenant's operations?

compliesADA.displayName: Are all locations up to code on accessibility requirements (ADA compliance)?

historicalClaimThreshold.displayName: Are there any individual claims that meet the following criteria?
